website_summaries.verdict: One of the most favored stroller organizers on the market, this helpful bag is a go-to for parents who want a larger storage space.
pros: Velcro can be attached in various ways, making the product fit almost any stroller size
Drink holders are deep to prevent spills
cons: Bag can slide down handles depending on your stroller

customer_reviews.title: Fits well with Convaid EZ Rider
customer_reviews.text: This review is for parents with chronically ill children. I want you all to know that this fit easily on our Convaid EZ Rider. No adjustments needed and honestly I don't see how it wouldn't work well with most special needs strollers. Given the customer service level of this company I am sure the owner would be glad to talk to you if you have any questions just contact him Joe Lau.
customer_reviews.author: K. Green

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect, it holds drinks of all different sizes with ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for!!! It's perfect, it holds drinks of all different sizes with no problem while keeping them cool at the same time. All of the extra compartments are what sold me I can now keep snacks, wipes, drinks, toys and my phone right in front of me. It came packaged so nice and neat. With easy to read instructions. Also fits my uppababy vista perfectly. Thank you for making such a great useful product. I would also like to add your customer service is beyond amazing! Keep it up. There should be more companies like yours.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Wolf

customer_reviews.title: A Dad's Perspective
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I admit it: I am not only the glad father of three, but a frequent mobilizer of a BOB stroller. My wife routinely laughs at me for the delight I take in pushing around the jogger/stroller and my need for an accessory pouch - the need is definitely mine, not hers. I love it. It comfortably holds my cell phone, a tall water bottle, wash cloths/rags, pens, pencils, markers and all the things a guy would want for his jogger. I like that the velcro straps grab hard and like the quality of the zippers and pouches. Extra credit goes to the communication, responsiveness, and service of Ethan and Emma who followed through on a carabiner that Amazon forgot.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Nelesen, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for city mini GT
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2016 city mini GT & originally purchased the baby jogger parent organizer. The baby jogger organizer did not fit my Starbucks iced coffee & had to be returned! I bought this organizer from Amazon & it's amazing. Fits my iced coffee, holds my iPhone, holds my car keys, my sons bottle & even more extra space. I haven't even filled all the pockets -- there's so much space! But it's still compact (same size as a baby jogger one but this one has better material) and I can fold up my city mini without taking it a part. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: m170

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT City Select Lux
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FOR BABY JOGGER CITY SELECT LUX! -does not fit with baby jogger city select lux. When I use the bench or glide board it’s really hard to move and the cup holders become useless because of the angle. - the cupholders do not hold large cups due to the handle bar placement and handle brake on the city select lux. You basically have one shallow cup holder available. ***update: While it still does not fit the City Select Lux I will say the customer service goes above and beyond and if I did have a stroller it fit - this would be a great product. I increased my rating based on their excellent customer service. ***
customer_reviews.author: Ashley g.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I ordered this! We just got a new stroller for my 1.5 year old son. I love our stroller but it only came with one cup holder. I often bring a sippy cup for my son and my husband and I usually get something to drink so having additional cup holders was must. Installing it takes some time. But once you’ve got it positioned it’s very secure and sturdy. I love the back bag because its perfect for throwing some diapers and wipes into. Plus, this whole thing folds up with my stroller.
customer_reviews.author: H. Carlin

customer_reviews.title: ... to our baby jogger city select and it works great. It has ample room for everything we need ...
customer_reviews.text: We have this attached to our baby jogger city select and it works great. It has ample room for everything we need (and more!) and for the most part it stays put. Every once in a while we hike it up on the handle and squeeze the velcro closed a little tighter, but it's really not a big deal. Even when loaded with multiple beverages, toys, phones, napkins, you name it, it still hangs true without worry of tipping/spilling the drinks. The overall design and fit is fantastic and I would recommend this model to anyone looking for something for their baby jogger city select.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Czop

customer_reviews.title: Probably great if it fits your stroller
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get this for our Uppababy Minu, for which we are still using the From Birth bassinet kit. We were unable to get this to stay up on the handle of the stroller. Tried it tight, tried it loose, tried it sort of sideways, tried the velcro this way, tried the velcro that way, whatever way we affixed it, it slid down the arms of the stroller and came to rest on the bassinet feet. Not cool if there's hot coffee at stake. Sending it back unfortunately. If it were able to stay up, seems like a completely useful and decent product with nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Quality long lasting organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Britax B Agile! Everything we could want in a stroller organizer and MORE. I feel like I did a lot of research and this brand kept popping up. Found a great warehouse deal and couldn’t be happier with the product. I don’t carry around too much besides my diaper bag, but now I feel like a day trip will be a breeze. No more throwing things in the bottom stroller basket! Now I can have a little organization in my life :) I can tell this will last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect. I had the Baby Jogger one but when we got a City Select stroller, it didn't fit great as I have the seat facing me and tilted back. The bottom would hit the seat and tilt forward, taking the drinks with it. This organizer fits way better on our stroller, and the drink holders are deeper too. I LOVE all the extras, zip off pouch, and little zipper and flap storage compartments. I didn't get a great fit but once I referred to the fit guide that is sent with each order, a small adjustment surprisingly made all the difference. It doesn't slip either!. So worth it!! Great customer service too!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The shipping was quick and packaging was nice and the company seems like a great small
customer_reviews.text: We have a Baby Jogger City Mini and though this organizer fits the stroller bars, when it's on it only works if the stroller is upright. If the baby reclines at all, the organizer doesn't work. It tips and gets pushed up by the seat in recline mode and is just a nuisance. We will be returning ours as after only trying it out once it was obvious it wasn't what we were looking for. The shipping was quick and packaging was nice and the company seems like a great small, family owned company but it just wasn't for us.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyCars

customer_reviews.title: Well organized!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! If you’re any bit of an OCD, organizeaholic like myself, then you will greatly appreciate all the little organizational compartments this attachment has to offer. Two separate cupholders that securely hold your beverages. All sorts of zippers and other little compartments to hold keys, phone etc. What is considered I believe to be the phone holder, is a little bit too small to hold my iPhone, however there is many other compartments that can accommodate. I got it in the gray color and love it. Looks quality. It fits our city lux jogger double stroller perfectly. Really wishing I had discovered this earlier on!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not the most convenient if you have the city select LUX
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this, but I’m not quite sure I do. I have the city select LUX stroller and because of the hand break the organizer doesn’t really fit :(. I installed it, but I had high hopes on this working. Because of the hand brakes the organizer doesn’t quite sit straight and also you can’t lean the seat back without removing the organizer. I’ll see how I feel having on the stroller hopefully it grows on me. Overall though the material and pockets are awesome! **Edit: The company just reached out to me regarding my feedback and I have to say I’m impress! The company alone has be at 5 stars. Great customer service! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Not for uppababy vista.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. I have a 2017 Uppababy Vista and this definitely does not work with that stroller. The first time I used it, it kept sliding further and further down until it was resting on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stroller organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this organizer! It's well made and had more compartments than I probably need. I mostly wanted it for the cup holders, and it holds my full water bottle and coffee-to-go cup, no problem. I like how the middle compartment is lined with insulated fabric like the cupholders: it was able to keep a bagged banana and my cellphone cool on a hot summer day. The fabric is thick and the seams well sewn. It has really strong velcro and the straps are nice and wide. It fits my BOB jogging stroller perfectly. The directions show three different ways to attach it. I liked the style shown above. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: AzWrath

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well on Baby Jogger City Select stroller
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material and the size of the organizer are great, but it does not fit well on the Baby Jogger City Select stroller. The hooks are too large, so the organizer slides down on the handlebar. Maybe it fits well on other strollers, but I can't use it with mine.
customer_reviews.author: gpan

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this because our stroller (Ergobaby) doesn't have a cup holder and their only storage space is just one big bag. This organizer doesnt have one cup holder... but 2 and they are deep and sturdy enough to hold 2 venti starbucks drinks! Perfect for the wife and I. The middle organizer is also deep enough to put our son's sippy cup and the organized compartments for our cel phones and snacks. The only downside of this organizer for our stroller (Ergobaby Metro) is that the organizer ends up slightly tilted instead of leveled (ie: the organizer is like this "\" instead of "-"
customer_reviews.author: Barca

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfy. The velcro in the fasteners were very good but the fasteners were so thick that it was covering the brake, which in the case of my stroller is located in the handle. I found myself having to move the organizer up and down on the handle to be able to use the brake. But after all, I decided to return it becuase some stitches were out in just about a week and I didn't even put much on it by then. So I don't think is a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Romina

customer_reviews.title: Not just for strollers!
customer_reviews.text: Still love it after several weeks. Using it for my old/used walker because it doesn't have the underseat storage. And I especially love the portion that unzips to use for my wallet. I can put my coffee container in one cup holder and water in the other. Can put keys, lotion, other things in the center pocket with the magnetic closure. Hooks great on the front of my walker and everything stays put when folded and put in a car/suv. So it works for babies and old folks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Neutz

customer_reviews.title: I like but not for my stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Uppababy Vista Stroller Overall, it's a good stroller organizer with the capability for larger storage needs. It feels of decent quality, the zippers and magnetic flap work well, the material seems durable enough to withstand constant use and friction. Although I like this organizer, I would consider something different for the uppababy stroller as the velcro straps have to be fastened at an angle for it to fit the stroller's handle design (looks kind of awkward, imo). I find myself constantly adjusting and fiddling the straps to keep it secure while in use. This is not a knock on the product but that it just doesn't work as well with the uppababy handlebars as it may with other strollers.
customer_reviews.author: babysh6rk

customer_reviews.title: Great storage capacity, a must have if traveling with a baby.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but I wanted to love it. It fits on my jogging stroller great, but on my backup umbrella stroller (where I really need the extra storage) it fits a little awkwardly, but it still works. If it was a seamless transition between the two, I definitely would have given 5 stars! This gave me the extra space I needed when traveling abroad, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit uppababy Vista
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this for my UppaBaby Vista stroller but sadly it did not fit well. I read other reviews about finding out how to appropriately use it onto the Vista but even then it did not stay upright. Maybe I’m just really bad at following directions? I think if it fit well, this would have been a great product as it seemed like it had a lot of storage space!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but doesn't work for Nuna MIXX 2019
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Nuna MIXX 2019 stroller. Unfortunately it doesn't fit well on it and I wasn't aware of it. When I contacted the seller, they confirmed it won't fit well on the MIXX and refunded without even me asking, that's real good customer service. Though, I can't fit straight, the seller gave some tips, which still doesn't work that well. The product itself however is really well thought and designed well, very handy and good amount of partitions/pockets! Only wish it fit o our stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra Kumar

customer_reviews.title: True to the headline - THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This really is the best organizer. I have an Uppababy stroller, and many parents went the route of getting the same brand for the stroller organizer attachment. All the parents I know who did that have all asked me where I got my organizer from. I love that it holds two drinks, has a secret compartment in the center that closes shut with the magnet. I love the zip-off pounch, and also that you have that other side mesh compartment. Finally, I love that you can adjust the size of it to fix more things. It's perfect and has helped eliminate an entire bag of stuff when I go out. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Chung

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, roomy and compact at the same time! Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Perfect for our Contours Options Elite Double stroller. So much storage in a compact design. Phone, keys, water bottles, doggie bags, snacks and more can all fit nicely. And it has a zip away pouch so if you leave stroller parked somewhere you can still keep the most valuables with you. Have had lots of compliments on it from other moms who say they've tried other ones but would rather have this one!! It stays put, doesn't slide and is very sturdy. Very, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: joysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best Fit for Uppababy Vista Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Storage options are very well thought out but I was surprised to see that this was one of the highest rated stroller organizers for the Uppababy Vista. It awkwardly fits onto the Vista so when it's strapped in the whole organizer is at a weird angle - not good for cups in the cup holders to be tilted. It also slips down the handles all the time which is annoying. Unfortunately, I'm not sure there's a better option out there though for the Vista...
customer_reviews.author: Retail Therapy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Velcro is easy to hook on the stroller and is very tight to stay in place for holding liquid drinks in. I especially enjoy the hidden compartment in the middle that flips back onto a magnet to hold into place. As a precaution I always drink from a sealed bottled drink and never drink hot drinks when using any stroller holder for beverages to protect little ones from possible spills, especially something that could burn like hot coffee. Other than saying that as a side note I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nevaeh

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not universal.
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to start by saying this is excellent quality. Next I'll say that this isn't for all strollers. We have the uppababy and this fits really awkward (see images) the only reason we got it was for the cup holders. As you see in the images the cups are tilted forward due to the angle of the handle. So while it fits, it's unusable. If you have a tilted arm like the one I have just keep that in mind. I could only get it straight when I held it, I suppose I could have sewed it, but why would I do that?
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Negm

customer_reviews.title: Great in Theory but Not Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: This is great while being used on the stroller but if you have a foldable one like most, it’s difficult to handle because it needs to be removed from the stroller before folding for the car but the bag itself doesn’t have a handle so it’s awkward to carry when it’s not attached to the pram / stroller. I’ve only used mine once because of this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tamatree21

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. I was really annoyed with my stroller because of the cup holders it came with. My husband and I would be walking and the water bottles would just fall out. I did some searching and found this wonderful item. It’s perfect for what we need. It has two cup holders and the magnetic center for my keys. It has really helped me and my hands have been full. I also love that I don’t have to take it off of the stroller when I fold it up. We love it and are very happy with it. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Stuckman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Universal Stroller Organizer
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this organizer for our Peg Perego Stroller, as the unit did not come with any provisions for accessible storage out of the box. Our impression is that the organizer is very practical and we'll suited for it's intended use. The material it's constructed from seems to be durable and easy to clean. The seams, Velcro and zipper all look strong as well. The organizer straps can be adjusted to level the unit relative to the stroller/handlebar, which we found quite nice. Overall, we give this product a 5 star review based on it's overall quality, delivered at a reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Ancil Ramlogan

customer_reviews.title: Works on Uppababy stroller
customer_reviews.text: Bought an Uppababy organized or my Uppababy Cruz and wasn’t satisfied with it. Did some research on Amazon and found this. Could not be happier with this purchase. The storage is bountiful, versatile and useful. This organizer was clearly designed by a parent. Once you get it strapped in properly it stays in place even on curved handlebars. Highly recommend getting this to add storage and functionality for your stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Tyfighter

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work with UPPABABY VISTA
customer_reviews.text: Would of loved for this to work on my baby’s stroller but it for some reason kept leaning back. The way the Velcro straps used to hold it in place weren’t angled correctly for the style our stroller was. We have a UPPABABY VISTA and this particular organizer could not sit on right. I can see it working on others just unfortunately not our stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd (or 4th -- I've lost track!) stroller organizer and by far the BEST! Wish I had this 3 years ago when my daughter was born! The velcro straps work perfectly on my Uppababy Vista and attach super tightly so the organizer doesn't slide around. The cupholder is large enough to hold my camelback water bottle, which hasn't fit in any other organizers thus far! It's very well made, and the zip-off pouch is pretty handy too! Definitely recommend this for all new and seasoned parents!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2017 Uppababy G-Lux and is cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Great storage but does not fit well on our 2017 Uppababy G-Lux. The straps that attach to the stroller are too wide. They would have to be bunched up to fit/attach to the handles of the stroller (the only place to attach a parent console is where the handles attach to the frame). As a result, the console appears crooked. Also, the material is thin and feels cheap to me. At this price point I expected more quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mom to be gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Giving as gifts to moms to be, love how I can organize everything and it makes long walks and trips that much easier, plus with all the space I don't have to worry about juggling a diaper bag, I fill up my organizer and go. I show what I usually have in my organizer, and there is still room!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It's a good idea, and I was very excited about it ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller organizer is just ok. It's quite flimsy, so if you wanted to put a water bottle or a drink in one of the cup holders, it won't hold it. Of course, this could be because of the way it fit on my stroller. I have a Graco sit and stand stroller, and this organizer doesn't fit the push bar of my stroller well at all. It's a good idea, and I was very excited about it since I like to travel lightly. However, this just didn't work for me. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Works with city select lux when you buy the extenders!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality stroller organizer! I’m very happy with it and pleased to say it DOES work with the city select lux stroller when you buy the extenders as well (does not work without them). I’ve had a heck of a time trying to find an organizer that works with our stroller because of the placement of the hand brake, so I was so happy when this organizer worked for us!
customer_reviews.author: Rostam

customer_reviews.title: Drinks for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: We have a baby contours double stroller with the infant car seat adapter, not having drink holders for mama and easy access to keys and phone is a pain in the butt.. so after reviewing what seemed like 1000 options i landed on this one ..and at first my husband was convinced it didn't fit..after some adjustments it works ok. Not ideal with the infant seat but once we have 2 stroller seats it seems it will work pretty well. It seems pretty secure but I wouldn't put anything important in the removable zipper pouch for fear of it coming off .....
customer_reviews.author: disneylover427

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my stroller and now I’m using it for my wagon. Love the storage on it. It. Folds up easy to fit in luggage if travelin. Took it to Disneyland was so happy I did. The extra storage was so handy for our travels, and you just strap the bottom to the stroller so it won’t swing into your shins. The insulation for the cup holders was nice as welll. If you need something small that can transform to big when you need it to then this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller organizer I’ve ever seen!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this stroller organizer is unmatched!!! I researched every one I could find before I finally settled on this one based on the good reviews. I have NO REGRETS. It sits on my city select perfectly and has so many pockets. I love the magnetic closure and the easy zip off pouch on the front. The bonus storage that flips down off the back is even more amazing!!! I cannot say enough good things about this product. Stop doing your research now and buy this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: madelyn

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller organizer is the best. I find the zip-off pouch in front so you can take your phone and cash/cards/keys with you, and the roll-down mesh pouch particularly clever. The cupholders are a great size and hold drinks securely, and the middle pocket is a good size for my phone, keys, baby hats, and pacis etc as well. The mesh pocket in the front isn't really big enough for phones these days but that's such a minor detail when you can put your phone in 2 other easy to access places.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend for the Uppababy Cruz
customer_reviews.text: I strongly do not recommend this product for the Uppababy Cruz, or essentially any stroller without perfectly horizontal handle bars. The velcro straps were very difficult to get in the perfect position, so the bag was always tilted, which is not ideal when trying to use it as a cupholder. It velcro straps also mean that you have to try to readjust the fit every time you take it on and off. I ended up returning this, and going with the cheaper
customer_reviews.author: David Grams

customer_reviews.title: Torn away easily and mostly mom and not baby functional
customer_reviews.text: Well, i had high hopes for this product but eventually got disappointed. The organizer has two main disadvantages: 1. It is a mom-centered organizer rather than baby-centered. It has a lot of space for cups, wallet, money, smartphone etc. But the rear mesh is the only storage for baby stuff, you have to put all you things together such as diapers, wipes, food, sunscreen, and that's not comfortable. 2. Although the quality looks high, the sticky hook and loop surface on the side of the organizer detached on first use.
customer_reviews.author: amit

customer_reviews.title: Fits my tandem Contours Options Elite perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits my tandem Contours Options Elite perfectly! Only hang up is for the back seat to recline, I need to readjust it a bit, which isn't a big deal. Holds our huge 11" tall / 3" wide cups for theme park days and my sister-in-laws huge galaxy phone with case in the front mesh pocket. So happy to have something that we can put stuff in and not worry about it falling about! We even put a 3rd cup in the center sometimes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Convaid strollers!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teenaged daughter's Convaid stroller and it is a life saver. It comfortably fits two drinks (three of you also use the center compartment, which is convenient when the whole family is out), and has a nice pocket for my phone. The detachable zippered pocket is convenient. The velcro on the adjustable straps has held up very well in the year+ that we've had this organizer.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked for the perfect stroller caddy! FOUND! I am so pleased! It goes on/off easily. The cup holders are substantial. I love the extra mesh pocket that hangs down. Parent's can't get enough storage when it comes to baby things. The zippers are sturdy. The caddy doesn't look cheap or flimsy. Stop looking and just buy this one...you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Van Arsdel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Omg I just got this organizer today and used it right the way. I don’t know why I didn’t buy it earlier. The product really well made and organization compartments are amazing. Previously I used diper bag and basket underneath my stroller, and if I put too much stuff it was hard to find her toy or wipes or her bottle, specially if I put any of this things in basket underneath my stroller, today I had everything I need in one area and I didn’t need to stress at all. Super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of gadget for our stroller. I always ask myself when I review items, how much does this product make my life easier? This product was easy to install and has so many pockets to store items. The top has 2 regular cup holders and the middle is big enough to fit a 40oz hydro flask.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: City Mini Double
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my city mini double stroller. I love it 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a stroller organizer because my stroller didn't come with a cup holder. This organizer comes with TWO INSULATED cup holders which are great. I love the front mesh pocket, I am able to quickly place my sunglasses in when I go in doors and they are easy and quick to locate. Middle compartment is spacious enough for snacks or diapers whatever you desire. Bought this based on reviews and glad I found the perfect one for me. Also easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  So much extra storage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to the storage capacity on our jogging stroller! We have a 1 year old and then a 13 year old who plays travel baseball...anyone who is in a baseball family knows that those games are looooong, sometimes we are at the field all day. Babies require a lot of STUFF sometimes and this adds SO much storage to the stroller it’s awesome, the cup holders are insulated which is great, it’s stays on wonderfully, it has all kinds of good compartments for my chapstick and bandaids and wet wipes and tissues. I usually don’t write reviews but i felt obligated to on this one because I liked the product so much!
customer_reviews.author: sara sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Not for drinks with straws
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hang quite upright so unless it is a water bottle with a lid the drink spills. I used with a britax stroller. It is nice that I can at least hold a water bottle and my phone, but I wish it was more sturdy and upright so I could hold a drink with a straw
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Very useful/versatile
customer_reviews.text: Wish i got this with my first. It really is a necessity, especially if you have more than one kid. It holds your drinks wells without rattling them around, theres a safe place for keys and your phone, and tons of other storage. It fit my graco stroller well with the velcro straps
customer_reviews.author: mango

customer_reviews.title: Stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second stroller organizer I bought from them. This works soooo well compared to others. There’s 2 cup holders and a middle compartment for other loose items. The velcro is really sturdy and stays put. I recommended this to other mom friends and they loved it too. Great product for organizing your stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L.

customer_reviews.title: Fire Red Very good. I use this on the Kolcraft cloud plus ...
customer_reviews.text: Kolcraft Cloud Plus Lightweight Stroller, Fire Red Kolcraft Cloud Plus Lightweight Stroller, Fire Red Very good. I use this on the Kolcraft cloud plus stroller because the cup holder that came with it got lost in disney world. I was so disappointed but this made everthing even better than before.so many pockets and compartments. It can hold up to 3 cups. Velcro is very strong and holds alot of weight!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Fits bugaboo cam3
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Loys of storage and versatility. I love that it fits my cam3 and has zipper pockets, magnetic closure, and Velcro. I can’t think of any negatives about it. Purchased an open box item from warehouse and I can’t understand why anyone would return it! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Fits Baby Jogger City Mini GT2
customer_reviews.text: Fits well with Baby Jogger City Mini GT2! Haven’t gotten to officially use it yet, as we are waiting for baby any day now, but it seems to be good quality and has a lot of storage features that will be useful! My only concern is size of cup holders and if they’ll hold drinks like gatorade!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Will lost its shape
customer_reviews.text: When I originally bought it I loved it. It’s been less than a couple of months and it has completely lost its shape and keeps falling off the stroller. It doesn’t even properly fit the water bottles anymore. As a result, I am buying clips to add to my stroller instead and had to invest in new water bottles as well. What a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: new mommy 323

customer_reviews.title: This works beautifully on pet strollers, too.
customer_reviews.text: This works beautifully on pet strollers, too. I bought this in the hope it would fit on my pet stroller, and thanks to the great Velcro wrap-straps the sizing is very flexible and it fits perfectly. There is room for two drinks, as well as car keys, a small wallet, a paperback, and of course there's room for treats for the puppies. I am very pleased with this organizer, and after seeing it on my stroller the other people at my dog training class are also going to be ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and made our stroller even better!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect finishing touch to our new stroller, giving just enough room and easy access to the things we needed without adding a lot of extra bulk or weight plus it can stay right in place when we fold it up too, very well made, zippers are great and the magnet flap is perfect, love it, thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds our expectations
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more thrilled with this purchase. It's better than I expected, the pictures online didn't show enough detail. Two cup holders with a small storage compartment between them (good for keys or snack), a pocket for cell phone, zippered pouch to hold cards on top (I would use for cards since you can see through it) , long pocket on the back (good for diaper and small wipes container) and a removable zippered pouch on the front. Fits perfect on our jogging stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for its size but very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Very pricy for how small it is. It shows that it can fit on a variety of stroller handles but it doesn’t work great with mine. Mine is a single handle rather than two. I do love the cup holders. Even a heavy yeti cup can go in one and not weigh the product down or make the Velcro release. I bought this product specifically because of the large hanging mesh compartment. No other similar product has that.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear1414

customer_reviews.title: Love this stoller organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! Attaches easily to my Britax B-Safe stroller and has plenty of storage space and compartments, without being too bulky. Cup holders are great as well. I also like that it's mesh and not a hard plastic attachment so I can still fold the stoller without having to remove it. Stays in place when moving too. Only good things to say! (Designated phone space won't fit bigger phones like iPhone Plus but plenty of other areas to store phone.)
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller organizer is a life saver! The pockets to hold beverages are very deep (my Chicco stroller beverage holders are very shallow and I cannot use them). I am able to hold all the basics that I need for myself and my baby in one place. And, the velcro is very strong and the organizer itself is very durable, so I'm able to keep it perpetually strapped onto the stroller even when I fold the stroller away. So, no need to keep attaching and detaching, it just stays on there like a constant companion always ready to hold your stuff. It is a great organizer for busy parents and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mamba172

customer_reviews.title: Carries everything and more
customer_reviews.text: It carries everything you could possibly need and more. Very convenient and cool looking. My only issue is that it doesn’t fit the UPPAbaby Vista perfect. The way the handle is shaped, it slides down a little too far. Im sure i could rework to fit better, i just haven’t yet. I do like how my wallet is secure and you can conceal a weapon very easily. I’m always worried someone weirdo is gonna bother us on a trail or out and about. Handy to have a knife or some pepper spray in its own little compartment at your finger tips just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Pomaikai

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nuna Tavo!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used a couple of times but seems sturdy and works with Nuna Tavo!!!! Velcro is super strong which is worrisome can I can see where it may lose its durability if you need to constantly open/close. It isn’t a perfect fit when it comes to coffee holders in proximity to handle bar but it works and held our venti Starbucks drinks fine. A review I read said they needed to remove basket when closing the stroller- that hasn’t been the case for me. Tavo opens and closes without removal of basket necessary!!
customer_reviews.author: MissPris

customer_reviews.title: This is the one and only organizer to get!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. My husband laughed and said “how much can one person talk about an organizer?” The answer... THIS MOM! Was gifted a Britax stroller which doesn’t come with a tray. So happy I found this organizer. Fits perfectly on the stroller, is sturdy and finally, something that fits my 1 liter water bottle! This one is definitely a win win!!!!!! Will recommended to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mom 2 Two

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the evenflo stroller wagon and the only downfall was no parent tray simce the wagon handle changes position to push or pull. This is seriously so perfect! It fits my big starbucks tumblers, my wallet and keys and so much more! Super sturdy and absolutely amazing! Im obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Coffey

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: there are so many similar styles on the market I wasn't sure this one was worth the extra money. Though I havent tried the others, I am thrilled with this one! Super sturdy, tons of storage. Makes day to day trips and airplane travel so much easier! I am using it on my CityMini GT by Baby Jogger.
customer_reviews.author: ZD

customer_reviews.title: This organizer is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nuna Stroller and really needed some extra storage. I tried several other organizers but they all tilted and spilled any beverage I put in there. This one is perfect and can easily be adjusted, plus it has a ton of storage which is great! They also sent some tips on how to prevent the organizer from tipping as well as exercises you can do to workout with your stroller which was a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something that fits my stroller! This organizer is very sturdy and keeps my drinks from tipping. It fits all of my cups and travel mugs. It holds everything that i need to have handy while walking. The center compartment is the perfect size for a bags of goldfish (one of my daughter's favorite snacks). My stroller folds easily with this organizer attached so I don't have to remove it for storage. This product will definitely go on my list of shower gifts for new moms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is the first stroller organizer I bought. I've always just hook my diaper bag to the stroller before and I was looking for something smaller while running errands with the kids. This organizer has good amount of compartments but I find it a bit bulky. I get annoyed when I have to take it on and off the stroller while getting in and out of the car. Overall it's an "ok" organizer but I am not in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Yu-Tin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is great. I have a bob rambler and it fits perfect. There are many compartments and compared to the other ones on the market, I feel this one has the most versatility. There’s pretty much a place for everything. Phone, wallet (little zip compartment), keys, etc. The only thing I wish is that it had a bigger cup holder hole. I can see this lasting a long time though.
customer_reviews.author: Mudcat51

customer_reviews.title: Good for single strollers
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for a single stroller. It fits on my double bob but I wish they had a bigger version for doubles. It looks kinda odd on such a large stroller. There is so much space on that bar that you could put a lot of storage into it. I run with mine and an easy access bigger model would be great (instead of having to bend over while running and use the storage on the bob) it’s a great quality product with lots of neat zippers and pouches. Fits most water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca warner

customer_reviews.title: Convenient stroller organizer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer. I use it with our City Mini Stroller but can also use on a variety of others. Love all of the different pockets. Simple to leave it on when stroller is folder. This is our second organizer. We now have two kids and wanted to have more drink holders on walks and outings. Our first is the Britax one. This is more expensive but not by much and has many more places for storing various things which you bring or accumulate on outings.
customer_reviews.author: emmajeanne16

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the best ad on I have bought for my stroller. It fits all we need and it is very sturdy and well built. There’s two cup holders, one central pocket with a top zipper and 3-4 other compartments. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Salomao

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with BOB stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Well made product that is compatible with my BOB jogging stroller. Love that it came from a “small business”. It is adjustable and works well when I reposition the stroller handle for jogging. Love that it has zippers for keys as well as strong Velcro. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My double stroller just got a facelift!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Contours Options double stroller and this product works great with it ! At this point I'm really shocked how many strollers don't come with stock cupholder or tray for mom and dad. I can't believe how long I've gone without having a place for a drink for the kids, a drink for myself, and even my cell phone, and snacks for the kids!! I've just started walking 2 miles every day since I'm pregnant again. This stroller organizer has truly helped me so much. It has several features that I wasn't even aware of that are wonderful!! The magnetized lid is awesome!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizer and totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this organizer to use on my stroller! It adds extra drink capacity so my husband I both can take our drinks. It gives me a secure place to keep my cell phone and my sunglasses. There are a perfect number of pockets! It's really sturdy. It's nice because you can move it to whichever stroller you need it on, although I like to keep it on my jogging stroller. I really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: BMille

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for bugaboo
customer_reviews.text: The organizer slide right down to the seat. The only option to have it stay up is to have it in the space where the hands go. And the straps aren’t wide enough to be comfortable to hold onto for the pushing of the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Stopthemad

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Strong Velcro to secure onto the handle of my 2016 city select. I'm still able to fold with it on - that's a plus. There's an extra compartment/mesh netting in the back for added convenience but the Velcro straps are a bit short for my taste. I'm currently using my city select as a double/with the Britax B-safe elite infant car seat - that could be the only issue. Overall, great product that I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RubyxCube

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is great and I love all of the pockets, space and two cup holders. The Velcro is strong and really holds the caddy on the stroller handle well. My only complaint is that the zipper pull on the small pocket flap fell off the first time I used it. It looks like the zipper wasn’t fully stitched into the seam and that’s why. I guess I’ll have to see if I can fix it somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Everything you would need
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this organizer. I used it for the first time this weekend with my granddaughter. I was happy to be able to carry a drink for her and myself. A place for my keys, and wallet. I like the removable "purse" to keep things handy when we left the stroller parked. I found myself comparing the organizer to others I saw, they didn't have any of the extra features this has. I feel it is well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: howgreatthouart

customer_reviews.title: Quality is amazing! But did not fit my stroller at all.
customer_reviews.text: So the quality of this organizer is amazing! All the pockets in storage are phenomenal! I’m giving it one star only on the basis that it said it fit my stroller but absolutely does not. I have the baby jogger luxe the handle is large and square and this did not fit I was really sad it’s an awesome organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair price for quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product pairs well with my Baby Jogger Summit x3. I won’t keep it on for runs, but it provides the quick access for my mommy things in everyday use. It’s adjustable, so I expect this product would work with many different makes/models of strollers. The materials feel to be high quality and durable. I love that it can be adjusted to different heights, and has additional storage that can be released below. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ross

customer_reviews.title: Best Organizer Ever
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a organizer for my sisters wheelchair when we go to my grandsons soccer games. The organizers I found under the wheelchair section was not helpful. Then I found this organizer and I know I am not using this for the usual manner, but I have to say this has been the best purchase I have made for the wheelchair. It keeps water bottles very cold, and has tons of room.
customer_reviews.author: Sue G.

customer_reviews.title: Useful stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: Cup holders are actually large enough and deep enough to actually hold cups of a variety of sizes. Easily was able to spot clean after several beverages were spilled. Easily installed. Velcro holds up very well, but also easy to remove/adjust if needed. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Your Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a must purchase item for every stroller. The instructions are terrible. It took me a while to figure out the best way to set it up on our Nuna stroller. I actually updated my review from 4 to 5 stars once I figured out how to mount it properly so our drinks stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Robert Cuda

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect for the traveling stroller
customer_reviews.text: We love the cup holders. However, the straps are very wide, therefore they don't fit on our Mountain Buggy Nano as well. It is a pain to fold the stroller with the organizer on. It's a love - hate relationship that we have with this organizer. Great quality. Just not sure how often we can use it on the Nano. It will be better on those bigger stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Preemie's parents

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizer - better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my pet stroller... Yes I am a crazy cat lady and my cats love to go for walks in their stroller. The stroller purchased had no storage so I bought this on a whim, was a little concerned about how pricey it was but I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: KIKI

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped us when we went to Disney last month. The mesh bag held any bigger items like our wipes, sunscreen, snacks and autograph book and I liked the small pockets for my phone, our passes, and change for the pennies machines.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Seams along velcro ripped
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the product for about a year and only ever removed it from the stroller a couple times. Went to move it to a new stroller this weekend and the seams along the Velcro completely ripped on one side. Very disappointed! Way too expensive a product to have that happen. I was otherwise happy with the product and storage options/space.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this more
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wanted to like this more, but it doesn't provide enough top-end useful storage. the bag that goes down below the organizer is actually more annoying than useful. The zip-off clutch isn't that useful either. Too bad - it has a lot of features that seemed good on paper, but really just more small compartments would have been more useful
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Not for Nuna Demi Grow
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the pockets are great, but it constantly slips down my Nuna Demi Grow. It needs something to fasten it to the handle, to stop from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: CC Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly with my Uppababy Vista
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller organizer! I have a 2017 Uppababy Vista and this works great! It is a little hard to use when the upper seat is facing you, but that won't be an issue when we turn the seat around. I think every mom and stroller needs this organizer! I used to have a sprout one that I never liked. My favorite part of this one is the phone hiding place in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: DBrown

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my purse since all my small things get lost in my diaper bag. It’s so convenient to zip the pouch on/off the drink holder, I use it everyday with or without the stroller. The pack itself stays on the stroller just fine when we fold the stroller. The Velcro is strong and seemingly will fit any stroller. This is probably my #1 Baby product purchase in terms of convenience.
customer_reviews.author: persianlover

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Britax B-Agile stroller, and loved everything about it except for the lack of storage capacity. This stroller organizer fits perfectly and has more than enough storage! The designer definitely had versatility in mind when making this product. Especially love the detachable zipper pouch and optional extra mesh storage bag. So pumped about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have a baby jogger city select and the bag fits perfectly well. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because when we have the second seat on (which is most of the time) the bag is sort of squished forward a bit. Overall an awesome bag though. It has the perfect pockets. I also love that it has the detachable pocket so that it's easy to keep important items in it, and take them with me inside a store or museum or something.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Fitting and placement
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I am doing so wrong, but this item is a nightmare. It is angled, slanted and I leveled. My drinks are tilted. And it directly smashes against my double city select stroller.
customer_reviews.author: SM

product_meta.title: Ethan & Emma Universal Baby Stroller Organizer with Insulated Cup Holders for Smart Moms. Diaper Storage, Secure Straps, Detachable Bag, Pockets for Phone, Keys, Toys. Compact Design Fit All Strollers
feature_bullets: TAKE EVERYTHING YOU NEED WITH YOU! As a mom, we understand you have a lot of “stuff” to cart around for you and your sweet babies--- toys, sippy cups, books, keys, phones, drinks, snacks, diapers, etc… We created the ultimate Universal Stroller Organizer Bag just for you, to help make your walks around town, trips to the airport, and shopping excursions easier! Have everything you need in one easy-to-find spot with our Ethan & Emma deluxe stroller organizer!

PERFECT ORGANIZER FOR YOUR BUSY LIFE! As a chic and important mom, we want to make your job a little easier. With our premium stroller organizer, a great stroller accessory, everything you need has a perfect spot to keep things organized, clean, and “Right where you need, When you need it!”

GIVE THE PERFECT BABY SHOWER GIFT! Are you looking to give the ultimate, thoughtful baby shower gift? If so, you have found the “right” product. Our Ethan & Emma stroller organizer is a gift that will make any mom’s life easier and more organized!

PREMIUM, PERFORMANCE, PERFECTION! We know the incredibly important role you play as a mommie, and we promise to only provide you with the best. At Ethan & Emma, we believe in premium materials, top performance, and perfection in design.

COMES WITH FREE STROLLER HOOK (limited time offer: see Special Offer section below for coupon code). A “DREAM COME TRUE” FOR BUSY MOMS! Whether you have a Baby Jogger, Britax, BOB, Bugaboo, Maclaren, Thule, Peg Perego, Graco, Evenflo, Joovy, Doona or Umbrella stroller, our Ethan & Emma stroller organizer will make your busy life more manageable. No need to carry a heavy and awkward diaper bag, purse, or backpack. You can bring everything you need in our high-end stroller organizer.

specifications.Safety warning: The size of our stroller organizer is 13"x3.9"x6.5". If you think our organizer size is too big or too small for your stroller, do not use it. Improper fitting can result in drink spillage. Please follow our company fitting instruction guide that comes with the product to ensure that the organizer is installed properly before use. We do not recommend carrying hot beverages since a moving stroller can cause unwanted spillage even when the organizer is securely installed. To ensure a safe and happy trip do not put heavy items in the stroller organizer. Excessive weight may cause the stroller to tip over. Do not use this product with a stroller that weighs less than 4kg.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,338 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
